uniforms (and the people who wore them)...

There is something about a uniform that makes one want to stand a little straighter, tidy up those straggly locks of hair and wish for shinier shoes. Here are some of our folks in uniform. We can't usually see the shoes but a click of the thumbnail will bring that hair up for closer inspection. Then click "back" on your browser to return to this page. Please add to our archive if you can.
